PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-09562021-11-13,  ,  ,  PMO,  , 
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectComposition of the Treasury Board
PrecisOrder (1) terminating the nominations made by Order in Council P.C. 2021-72 of February 12, 2021; (2) nominating the Members of the Queen's Privy Council for Canada who, in addition to the President of the Treasury Board and the Minister of Finance, are to constitute the TREASURY BOARD; (3) nominating the Members of the Queen's Privy Council for Canada to be alternates to serve in their place; (4) declaring that three members of the Treasury Board constitute a quorum.
AttachmentsAttachment
